title: Go spec notation, Production doesn't permit empty body
body:
by **nmessenger**: 
The EmptyStmt production [1] in the Go spec has (of course) an empty body, which isn't
permitted in the Production metaproduction of the Notation section [2]. I think this can
be fixed by changing Production to read:

    Production  = production_name "=" [ Expression ] "." .

I can't in good conscience call this anything more than _extremely_ minor and nitpicky,
but unless I am mistaken it is an error nonetheless.

[1] http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Empty_statements
[2] http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Notation
